section.title: Cinnamon Spin
section.para: The Cinnamon desktop version 2.6 is now available as a Spin for Fedora 23. Cinnamon is a modern desktop environment based on the GNOME Shell, with advanced features and a traditional and flexible user experience.
Updates and improvements in this release include:

listitem.para: HTML5 and XScreenSaver support for animated screensavers
New inhibit applet to hide notifications and temporarily suspend power saving events
Redesigned system settings panel for improved usability
Accessibility improvements, including better support for ATK/Orca, magnifiers, and and a new On-Screen Keyboard applet

section.para: See the Cinnamon official website for more information on Cinnamon, and go to http://spins.fedoraproject.org to download the Spin.

section.title: GNOME
section.para: Fedora 23 will feature the latest available version of Gnome - 3.18. More information on Gnome 3.18 can be found here: https://wiki.gnome.org/ThreePointSeventeen/ReleaseNotes.

section.title: Sugar
section.para: Originally started as part of the One Laptop per child initiative, Sugar is a desktop environment targeted for children ages 5 - 12 to provide learning and educational activities through rich media. Sugar is the core component of a worldwide effort to provide every child with the opportunity for a quality education.
This update to sugar 0.106 includes the following:

listitem.para: New social help for access to discussion forums and collaborative learning

section.para: See the SugarLabs release notes for more information on this sugar release.
